nodes.text: A rich Hosnian Prime racer owned a backup ship with purple trim. He brought it to the Colossus around 34 ABY for the All Aces Battle Royale. The Resistance spy Kazuda Xiono stole it out of the hangar to use it in the race under the pseudonym "Bolt-Shatterer-K." Xiono used it to try to intercept Marnia Un'la'na's transmission. During the race, Xiono crashed the ship. He returned it to the hangar without the owner knowing.
The racing ship appears in the comic "All Aces Battle Royale (comic)", published in Star Wars Adventures (2017) 16 in 2018.
